what: Provides access to the OpenHolidays API
title: Provides access to the OpenHolidays API
text: goal openholidaysR provide dates public school holidays number countries subdivisions OpenHolidays API https://openholidaysapi.org/.

title: Provides access to the OpenHolidays API
text: can install development version openholidaysR GitHub :

title: Provides access to the OpenHolidays API
text: basic example shows get public holidays Germany January 2025:
code: library(openholidaysR)  oh_public_holidays(country = "DE",                    language = "DE",                    start_date = "2025-01-01",                    end_date = "2025-01-31") #>                                     id  startDate    endDate   type #> 1 27f0d8cd-76b2-47e7-89ac-a3a9f6a6b1ba 2025-01-01 2025-01-01 Public #> 2 1c80b87d-8221-4dc2-9a1a-3b0f57dce9f5 2025-01-06 2025-01-06 Public #>                      name regionalScope temporalScope nationwide #> 1             DE, Neujahr      Regional       FullDay       TRUE #> 2 DE, Heilige Drei Könige      Regional       FullDay      FALSE #>                      subdivisions #> 1                            NULL #> 2 DE-ST, DE-BW, DE-BY, ST, BW, BY

what: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
text: function retrieves school holidays OpenHolidays API specified country within given date range.

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
code: oh_school_holidays(   country,   language = "EN",   start_date,   end_date,   subdivision = NULL )

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
text: country Country ISO code (e.g., "DE"). language Language code (default: "EN"). start_date Start date YYYY-MM-DD format. end_date End date YYYY-MM-DD format. subdivision Optional subdivision ID (want holidays specific state/province).

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
text: data frame school holidays.
